jwt.title: Failed to authorize
jwt.text: Entered data is valid, but authorization failed. Please try again later.

not_found.title: Not found
not_found.text: The requested page does not exist.

unprocessable.title: Failed to read request data
unprocessable.text: Request data is invalid and cannot be processed. Please try again later.

write.title: Failed to save data
write.text: Request data is valid, but cannot be saved. Please try again later.

dashboard.title: Hakutest Dashboard
dashboard.address_tip: To ensure that your students can use Hakutest, open this address on their devices.

option.single: Add answer options and select a correct one:
option.multiple: Add answer options and select correct ones:
option.detailed: Tasks with detailed answer are checked manually.

expired.title: Test has expired
expired.text: This test has expired and is no longer available. Please contact your teacher for details.

restart.tooltip: You will need to restart Hakutest for the changes to take effect

advanced.tooltip: This setting or a group of settings is intended for advanced users only and should be modified with care

debug.label: Debug
debug.tip: Run Hakutest in debug mode, which allows to see more information in the logs.

disable_tray.label: Hide tray icon
disable_tray.tip: Run Hakutest without a system tray icon.

open_at_startup.label: Open at startup
open_at_startup.tip: Open Hakutest in the browser upon startup.

lang.label: Language
lang.tip: Language of the interface. Applied for both student and teacher interface.

port.label: Port
port.tip: Port on which Hakutest server is started.

overwrite.label: Overwrite results
overwrite.tip: Overwrite student results on test form resubmission.

path.label: Save results into
path.tip: Directory (folder) in which Hakutest stores student results.

show.label: Show results
show.tip: Show results to students immediately after test form is submitted.

teacher.label: Security policy (teacher)
teacher.tip: Access rules for teacher pages (e.g. Dashboard, Settings).

student.label: Security policy (student)
student.tip: Access rules for teacher pages (e.g. Test Search, Result Overview).

dialect.label: Users DB dialect
dialect.tip: Dialect of the database containing the user data.

dsn.label: Users DB DSN
dsn.tip: DSN (Data Source Name) of the database containing the user data.

path.label: Save tests into
path.tip: Directory (folder) in which Hakutest stores tests.

default_task_type.label: Default task type
default_task_type.tip: Default task type when adding task in the editor.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete results?

delete_selected.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete selected results?

results.fallback: You don't have saved results yet

tests.title: Tests

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete selected tests?

tests.fallback: You don't have any tests yet

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this test?

test_not_found.title: Test not found
test_not_found.text: The test you are requesting does not exist.

result.disabled: Result not displayed according to Hakutest settings. If you want to know the result, contact your teacher.
result.note: The actual score may be reduced by the teacher after manual check.
result.title: Your result

test.confirm: Are you sure you want to submit your answers?
